feature.label: iSphere STRPREPRC Support (optional)
feature.description: iSphere STRPREPRC Support (optional) The "iSphere STRPREPRC Support" feature delivers services that are specific to RDi. It completely relies on and extends the iSphere Core Feature regarding to RDi.
